oai_dc:dc.dc:description: =kasin does not eat certain foods such as fish, crabs, fowls or pigs; his father does eat fish, but his mother does not. 1) This short note appears to be an accompaniment to words that appear on the contents page of the notebook, 2) This story is found in Book IV-3.
